reviewText: OK,Hold on this is an English/Irish co-production based on Indiana Jones.Some scenes are definitely similar to original `Raiders Of The Lost Ark',But,'Tween influences like cool cars and spiffy bad guys.This is a possible dvd series from Chemical Burn, Hope they build on more challenging action traditions.Plot moves well,lots of action fighting,Car stunts and explosions.
summary: What TWILIGHT did for vampires,This does for INDIANA JONES !
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever

reviewText: This devil movie is spooky.  There isn't much in the blood & gore department here, but plenty of psychological creepiness that will keep you up at night if you're a wimp like me.  I really liked it, it's got a great story...it just scared the bejeezus out of me!
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever

reviewText: In the realm of ultra low budget movies, the cheap horror film seems to be the go-to genre.  Chemical Burn Entertainment, in my opinion, released one of the most effective examples of rogue filmmaking that I've seen this year with the sublime "The Defiled."  Looking at the rest of their catalog, however, has had decidedly mixed results.  "Idol of Evil," with its provocative title and vivid DVD cover art, had me expecting a nightmarish tale filled with gruesome imagery.  But those looking for a horror and gore title (a category that the releasing company classifies this film as) will be sadly disappointed or utterly mystified by the actual film.  A low-key and mild adventure movie, "Idol of Evil" will not satisfy anyone looking for horror.  That said, the picture is actually quite a bit better than you might expect.This tale, against all preliminary notions, actually attempts to tell a story and looks like a real movie.  (Many of this company's films are shot on video at one location and never transcend a homemade quality).  Richard Cambridge stars as a renowned scholar who must go into the field when a respected mentor goes missing.  It seems that a nefarious group is searching for an ancient artifact that will give them some sort of otherworldly power.  Cambridge, with his insider's knowledge, plays a reluctant adventurer.  Locating the culprits, they appear to be looking for the relic in the local forest.  The outside visuals never give you the feeling of desolation, however, it seems that most of the action is taking place in a public park.  So imagining that the artifact could be in such an obvious place takes you out of the moment, but is also quite amusing.Despite the budgetary limitations, the first three quarters of this film actually tell a decent story.  And Cambridge is solid enough to maintain your interest.  Again, this is mildly involving adventure and the most you get in the way of action is some obviously staged fisticuffs.  I don't know what they were thinking about calling this horror.  The final conflict, however, turns into a gonzo "Raiders of the Lost Ark" scenario--except without the special effects or actors to pull it off.  The film's biggest moments, thus, are its weakest elements for me.  But it is what it is--and the film needed to attempt a big pay-off.  About 2 1/2 stars, I'm improbably going to round up--both for Cambridge and in recognition that this was much better than I anticipated based on how it's being presented.  KGHarris, 3/11.
summary: No Horror And Gore Here--A Mild Adventure That Goes Wonky In The Final Act
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever

reviewText: A great "quick--save the earth from Satanic apocalypse!" story.  It's actually pretty disturbing though...they manage to get under your skin and freak you out!
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever

reviewText: I wasn't sure about this movie before i watched it. I've had a few bad experiences with low budget british movies before. This was ok. The beginning was a little slow to begin with but well paced with plenty of action in the middle. The ending is very similar to raiders of the lost ark.I feared the worst when i saw that the movie starred richard cambridge and marysia kay from the atrocious demonic but cambridge is good in this and kay isn't in it much. Elliott is a sexy and feisty heroine .Not awesome but worth a watch.
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever

reviewText: I thought for an indie Horror/adventure, that this was very well done, I was thoroughly entertained the whole time. I would defenitely recommend this to anyone who's looking for a good movie to watch, not just horror fans.
Title: Idol Of Hell: Hell Is Forever
